validation.message: Page name can only contain the characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -, and _
A page title must be provided

entry.value:
{"controlHints":[{"text":"The page name uniquely identifies the page. 
Since pages are sorted alphabetically by name in Rapid Design a naming convention that groups pages by function or purpose is recommended. 
Page names can be changed at any time.
","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P3_C45_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The page title is shown to users in the title bar of the browser","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P3_C46_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use the description to add any further details about the page.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P3_C47_","type":"hover"}]}

page.description: Allows users to create new pages in their application

entry.value: if (_undo.length > 0) $("#rapid_P3_C39_").text("You have unsaved changes which you will lose if you create this new page");
